name: skyscanner-flights
title: Flight Search
description: Search for flights with natural language and open results on Skyscanner.com
author: ayushtom

commands.name: search-flights
commands.title: Search
commands.subtitle: Flight Search
commands.description: Search for flights using natural language

commands.name: search-flights-manual
commands.title: Form Search
commands.subtitle: Flight Search
commands.description: Search for flights using a quick form

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
